title: Charming 2 BR/1 Bath - Avail 8/1
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   2 Bedroom vintage apartment - 531 Grove St Evanston IL 60201 To schedule a showing, please contact Jim at 708-508-1258  Unbelievably charming vintage building in downtown Evanston. Spectacular second floor courtyard. Close to Northwestern University and all that downtown Evanston has to offer: shopping, restaurants, Whole Foods and more. Close to the lake, parks and public transportation. This location can't be beat!  RENTAL FEATURES Living room Breakfast nook Range / Oven Refrigerator Heat: forced air Cable-ready Hardwood floor Tile floor  Amazon Key Entry system, Shared Laundry in building.  One year lease. Heat and water included in rent No Pets. Non-refundable $50 application fee and $250 move-in fee for each adult.  Photos are representative of apartments in the building and do not represent any specific unit.  Schermerhorn and Co. 847-869-4200 2737 Central Street Evanston, IL 60201 http://www.schemerhorn-realestate.com We require a $250 move-in fee and a $50 non-refundable application fee per adult at the time of application.
